articles.title: Malaria death toll to exceed COVID-19's in sub-Saharan Africa: WHO - Reuters

articles.content: LONDON (Reuters) - Deaths from malaria due to disruptions during the coronavirus pandemic to services designed to tackle the mosquito-borne disease will far exceed those killed by COVID-19 in sub-Sah… [+2231 chars]

articles.title: Houston Dr Joseph Varon hugs and comforts patient in COVID-19 ICU in viral photo - KGO-TV
articles.description: A now-viral photos shows Dr. Joseph Varon, a doctor at United Memorial Medical Center in Houston, Texas, hugging and comforting a patient in the COVID-19 ICU on Thanksgiving.
articles.content: HOUSTON, Texas -- A photo of a Houston doctor has gone viral after it showed him hugging and comforting a patient in the COVID-19 intensive care unit on Thanksgiving.The photo of Dr. Joseph Varon and… [+1660 chars]
